name: all_unit_leader
description: Check if all unit leaders owned by the current country scope meet the trigger.

name: any_unit_leader
description: Check if any unit leader meets the trigger.

name: all_army_leader
description: Check if all army unit leaders owned by the current country scope meet the trigger

name: any_army_leader
description: Check if any army unit leader owned by the current country scope meets the trigger

name: all_navy_leader
description: Check if all navy unit leaders owned by the current country scope meet the trigger

name: any_navy_leader
description: Check if any navy unit leader owned by the current country scope meets the trigger.

name: random_unit_leader
description: Targets a random unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: every_unit_leader
description: Targets every unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: random_army_leader
description: Targets a random army unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: every_army_leader
description: Targets every army unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: random_navy_leader
description: Targets a random naval unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: every_navy_leader
description: Targets every naval unit leader owned by the current country scope

name: global_every_army_leader
description: Targets every army leader for every country in the world (Better to use every_army_leader if you know the country)

name: OVERLORD
description: Targets the overlord of the current scope, if current scope is a subject

name: TAG
description: Targets a specific country by tag

name: any_country
description: Targets any country in the world (including the current scope, see any_other_country)

name: any_country_with_original_tag
description: Targets any country with current scope's original tag

name: any_neighbor_country
description: Targets any neighboring country of the current scope

name: any_home_area_neighbor_country
description: Targets any country that shares a border with the current scope's home area (cored states)

name: any_guaranteed_country
description: Targets any country with current scoped country guarantees

name: any_allied_country
description: Targets any allied country of the current scope

name: any_other_country
description: Targets any other country in the world (not including the current scope)

name: any_enemy_country
description: Targets any enemy country of the current scope

name: any_occupied_country
description: Targets any occupied country by the current scope

name: all_neighbor_country
description: Targets all neighboring countries of the current scope

name: all_country
description: Targets all countries in the world
